Posts.EditableText: I updated my profile with my birthday and was born in 2001, however it still says some games are restricted and to update my profile to make sure I’m 18 or older instead of letting me view them. Did I update my profile wrong or something? Also sorry if this is the wrong forum I wasn’t sure which of the 4 this problem would go under.

Posts.EditableText: From past answers to similar questions, I think you need to log off and close the browser, then open it again and re-log on & you should be good to go. You may need to clear the cache too.
Posts.HTML: From past answers to similar questions, I think you need to log off and close the browser, then open it again and re-log on & you should be good to go. You may need to clear the cache too.
